name: Color Break (jordyRG)
description:
An Bullet hell interpretation of Bricknoid. Destroy all the bricks to win - and receive red, green or blue shards to unlock upgrades. but beware, they are not going down without fight!

Select two colors before starting the game to modify the amount of RGB shards based on the RGB components of the color.

CONTROLS:
     - Use A and D to move the platform;
     - Use SPACE to dash in the direction you're moving;
